Package com.vividsolutions.jcs.algorithm.linearreference

Class Summary
LengthIndexedLine Supports linear referencing along a LineString using the length along the line as the index.
LengthOfPoint Computes the length along a LineString to the point on the line nearest a given point.
LengthSubstring Computes a substring of a LineString between given distances along the line.
LengthToPoint Computes the length along a LineString to the point on the line nearest a given point.
LineStringLocation Represents a location along a LineString.
LocatePoint Provides various ways of computing the actual value of a point a given length along a line.
LocationIndexedLine Supports linear referencing along a LineString using LineStringLocations as the index.
LocationOfPoint Computes the LineStringLocation of the point on a LineString nearest a given point.
LocationOfSubLine Determines the location of a subline along a LineString.
LocationSubString Computes the subline of a LineString between two LineStringLocations on the line.
